00053 
00066     class RTT_API Timer
00067         : public base::RunnableInterface
00068     {
00069     public:
00073         typedef int TimerId;
00074     protected:
00075         TimeService* mTimeserv;
00076         base::ActivityInterface* mThread;
00077         Semaphore msem;
00078         mutable Mutex m;
00079         typedef TimeService::nsecs Time;
00085         typedef std::vector<std::pair<Time, Time> > TimerIds;
00086         TimerIds mtimers;
00087         bool mdo_quit;
00088 
00089         bool initialize();
00090         void finalize();
00091         void step();
00092 
00093         // The main 'event' loop.
00094         void loop();
00095 
00096         bool breakLoop();
00097 
00098     public:
00111         Timer(TimerId max_timers, int scheduler = -1, int priority = 0);
00112 
00113         ~Timer();
00114 
00120         virtual void timeout(TimerId timer_id);
00121 
00126         void setMaxTimers(TimerId max);
00127

00137

00146
